sourcesContent: import{computed as g,defineComponent as v,inject as x,onMounted as L,onUnmounted as k,provide as C,ref as j,unref as w}from"vue";import{useId as R}from"../../hooks/use-id.js";import{render as h}from"../../utils/render.js";let a=Symbol("LabelContext");function p(){let t=x(a,null);if(t===null){let n=new Error("You used a <Label /> component, but it is not inside a parent.");throw Error.captureStackTrace&&Error.captureStackTrace(n,p),n}return t}function K({slot:t={},name:n="Label",props:i={}}={}){let e=j([]);function r(o){return e.value.push(o),()=>{let l=e.value.indexOf(o);l!==-1&&e.value.splice(l,1)}}return C(a,{register:r,slot:t,name:n,props:i}),g(()=>e.value.length>0?e.value.join(" "):void 0)}let P=v({name:"Label",props:{as:{type:[Object,String],default:"label"},passive:{type:[Boolean],default:!1}},setup(t,{slots:n,attrs:i}){let e=p(),r=`headlessui-label-${R()}`;return L(()=>k(e.register(r))),()=>{let{name:o="Label",slot:l={},props:d={}}=e,{passive:c,...s}=t,u={...Object.entries(d).reduce((f,[b,m])=>Object.assign(f,{[b]:w(m)}),{}),id:r};return c&&(delete u.onClick,delete s.onClick),h({ourProps:u,theirProps:s,slot:l,attrs:i,slots:n,name:o})}}});export{P as Label,K as useLabels};
